name: reaction
doc: Apache Thrift IDL definition for the reaction service interface

members.name: TRIVIAL
members.doc: Trivial reaction for calculation of reaction effects

members.name: FORMATION
members.doc: Formation reaction of a product from master species

members.name: DISSOLUTION
members.doc: Dissolution reaction for a mineral (end member) or gas in

members.name: EVAPORATION
members.doc: Dissolution reaction for mineral/liquid in gas

members.name: PRODUCT
members.doc: Component properties to be defined via this reaction properties

members.name: CATALYST
members.doc: Catalyzes the reaction but is not consumed in it

structs.name: Reaction
structs.doc: Description of a reaction between substances

fields.name: symbol
fields.doc: Unique name/ID of this reaction (e.g. product species name)

fields.name: sourcetdb
fields.doc: Source TDB: enum validated with class SourceTDB

fields.name: level
fields.doc: Level of the reaction (for superimposed IC or LMA reaction sets)

fields.name: name
fields.doc: Name of the reaction (not compulsory)

fields.name: reactyp
fields.doc: Type (class) of reaction: enum validated with class ReactionType

fields.name: Tst
fields.doc: Reference temperature for standard state (usually 298.15 K)

fields.name: Pst
fields.doc: Reference pressure (usually 1 bar = 10^5 Pa, sometimes 1.013 bar = 1 atm

fields.name: logKr
fields.doc: Standard equilibrium constant "logK0" (set in log10 units)

fields.name: drsm_volume
fields.doc: Standard volume effect per mole "drV0" m3/mol

fields.name: drsm_gibbs_energy
fields.doc: Standard Gibbs energy effect per mole  "drGO" J/mol

fields.name: drsm_enthalpy
fields.doc: Standard enthalpy effect per mole "drH0" J/mol

fields.name: drsm_entropy
fields.doc: Standard entropy effect of reaction "drS0" J/K/mol

fields.name: drsm_heat_capacity_p
fields.doc: Standard heat capacity effect per mole "drCp0" J/K/mol

fields.name: method_genEoS
fields.doc: General method (or equation of state for both T and P correction), validate with class MethodGenEoS

fields.name: method_corrT
fields.doc: Method of temperature correction of thermodynamic properties, validate with class MethodCorrT

fields.name: method_corrP
fields.doc: Method of pressure correction of thermodynamic properties validate with class MethodCorrP

fields.name: limitsTP
fields.doc: Lower and upper T, P limits for T,P corrections

fields.name: logk_ft_coeffs
fields.doc: Coefficients of logK(T) function per mole  a0 to a6 "logKTc"

fields.name: logk_pt_values
fields.doc: Interpolation array for logK(P,T) values

fields.name: dr_heat_capacity_p_t_coeffs
fields.doc: Coefficients of Cp0(T) function per mole "drCpTc"

fields.name: dr_volume_pt_coeffs
fields.doc: Coefficients of V0(T,P) function per mole "drVpTc"

fields.name: dr_sm_rb_coeffs
fields.doc: Coefficients of Ryzhenko-Bryzgalin model "drRBc

fields.name: isotop_lna_coeffs
fields.doc: Coeffs of 1000ln(alpha) = f(T) equation a0 to a4

fields.name: isotop_counter_fraction
fields.doc: Mole fraction of counter-isotope in natural mixture (for isotopes)

fields.name: comment
fields.doc: Comment - e.g. who entered/modified, ...

fields.name: datasources
fields.doc: Labels of datasource DB objects

fields.name: time_stamp
fields.doc: Timestamp (

fields.name: equation
fields.doc: Equation of the reaction (not compulsory)

structs.name: ReactionComponentData
structs.doc: Data for processing reactions; properties from a substance connected to the reaction via takes edges

fields.name: rct
fields.doc: Type of reaction component: enum validated with class ReactionComponentType

structs.name: ReactionData
structs.doc: Work structure keeping the data to check/calculate reaction

fields.name: Nrcs
fields.doc: Number of components taking part in the reaction

fields.name: rcs
fields.doc: Array of data for reacting components

fields.name: T
fields.doc: Current temperature in K

fields.name: P
fields.doc: Current pressure in bar (Pa?). These properties should already be for current T,P

fields.name: logKr
fields.doc: Standard equilibrium constant "logK0" (log10, set in units)

fields.name: lnK0
fields.doc: Equilibrium constant from drG0 = -RTlnK0

fields.name: drV0
fields.doc: Standard volume effect per mole "drV0" m3/mol

fields.name: drG0
fields.doc: Standard Gibbs energy effect per mole  "drGO" J/mol

fields.name: drH0
fields.doc: Standard enthalpy effect per mole "drH0" J/mol

fields.name: drS0
fields.doc: Standard entropy effect of reaction "S0f" J/K/mol

fields.name: drCp0
fields.doc: Standard heat capacity effect per mole "Cp0" J/K/mol

fields.name: slaveid
fields.doc: ID of "product" substance for which to calculate properties

fields.name: computed
fields.doc: Set to true if the reaction props or slave props computed

structs.name: ThermoPropertiesReaction
structs.doc: Structure keeping the thermodynamic properites which can be calculated for a reaction

fields.name: reaction_gibbs_energy
fields.doc: The apparent standard molar Gibbs free energy of reaction

fields.name: reaction_helmholtz_energy
fields.doc: The apparent standard molar Helmholtz free energy of reaction

fields.name: reaction_internal_energy
fields.doc: The apparent standard molar internal energy of reaction

fields.name: reaction_enthalpy
fields.doc: The apparent standard molar enthalpy of reaction

fields.name: reaction_entropy
fields.doc: The standard molar entropy of reaction

fields.name: reaction_volume
fields.doc: The standard molar volume of reaction

fields.name: reaction_heat_capacity_cp
fields.doc: The standard molar isobaric heat capacity of reaction

fields.name: reaction_heat_capacity_cv
fields.doc: The standard molar isochoric heat capacity of reaction

fields.name: logKr
fields.doc: Standard equilibrium constant "logK0" (log10, set in units)

fields.name: lnK0
fields.doc: Equilibrium constant from drG0 = -RTlnK0
